definition: Lee Hsien Loong (1952-), Singapore PAP politician, eldest son of Lee Kuan Yew 李光耀[Li3 Guang1 yao4], prime minister from 2004

sentences.english: His son, Lee Hsien Loong, is Singapore's third and current prime minister.
sentences.chinese: 其子李顯龍是新加坡的現任總理，也是第三任總理。

sentences.english: After the ceremony, Vice Premier Wu held a welcoming banquet for her Singaporean counterpart on his visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，吳儀爲李顯龍訪華舉行了歡迎宴會。

sentences.english: In February 1952, our first son Hsien Loong was born.
sentences.chinese: 我們的大兒子李顯龍在1952年2月出生。
